full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHRO BO SME BRTZEGS KYI BDAG BSKYED KYI CHO GA DANG 'GONG BSREG 'GONG PO MTHAR BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES  KHRO BO SME BRTZEGS KYI SBYIN BSREG 'GONG PO MTHAR BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN MDZES PA'I KU SHRI SLOB DPON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE DBANG, PI SHI RIL THU THO YON DGE SLONG SHES RAB RDO RJE, NIG THA PI LIG THU TZU RA CHE DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG PO, MER KEN TA'I CHEN NANG SO DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG YON TAN SOGS KYIS, ,SMAN RAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I SBYIN BSREG GI CHO GA 'DI NYID GZHIR BYAS 'DI LA 'DON CHA RGYAS PAR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, PAndI TAS CHOS RJE'I MING CAN GYIS 'DI NYID GZHIR BYAS NAS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
